# I work on issues related to global health and development, with a focus on education in low and middle-income countries.

::::: {.grid .align-items-start}
::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-7}
### Biography

I’m a Senior Researcher at Rethink Priorities where I support the Global Health and Development team. My published work explores the politics of education and issues in political economy. A political scientist by training, my work appears in *Comparative Politics*, *World Development*, and other journals. I’m also an #rstats fan/evangelist.
